      • getPhrase

        public static java.lang.String getPhrase()
        Selects one of ten random Arnold Schwarzenegger quotes to be used in the game.
        Returns:
        a random quote

      • guess

        public static char guess​(java.lang.String phrase,
                         int counter)
        Reads a character from the user, ensures that it is valid (i.e. not a number) and that it is not an already revealed.
        Parameters:
        phrase - the phrase to be deciphered
        counter - counts which guess number it is currently
        Returns:
        the user's guess (a character)

      • scramblePhrase

        public static java.lang.String scramblePhrase​(java.lang.String phrase,
                                              int[] scrambleIndex)
        This program takes a phrase, and an array of indexs to scramble it with. Then it iterates over the phrase, replacing each index point with an asterik.
        Parameters:
        phrase - a phrase to be scrambled
        scrambleIndex - the indexes of the letters to be scrambled
        Returns:
        a scrambled version of the phrase

      • spaces

        public static int[] spaces​(java.lang.String phrase)
        This method takes in a phrase and determines at what indexes it's punctuation and spaces are at. It then returns and array of those indexes.
        Parameters:
        phrase - the phrase to be examined
        Returns:
        and array of indexes that represent the punctuation marks and spaces in the phrase

      • scrambleIndex

        public static int[] scrambleIndex​(java.lang.String phrase,
                                  int[] spaceArr)
        This method determines which letters will be replaced with asteriks'.
        Parameters:
        phrase - a phrase to do calculations on
        spaceArr - the indexes of the spaces and punctuation marks in the phrase
        Returns:
        an array of indexes which represent which letters to replace with asteriks'

      • checkPhrase

        public static java.lang.String checkPhrase​(java.lang.String phrase,
                                           java.lang.String secretPhrase,
                                           char userGuess)
        This method checks to see if the user guessed a correct letter.
        Parameters:
        phrase - the phrase to be deciphered
        secretPhrase - the deciphered phrase
        userGuess - the user's guess (a character)
        Returns:
        the updated phrase (if user guessed correctly, the same phrase if not)

      • printSummary

        public static void printSummary​(java.lang.String secretPhrase,
                                int counter)
        Calculates and displays the users score, the secret phrase and the number of tries.
        Parameters:
        secretPhrase - the phrase that was deciphered
        counter - the amount of tries it took the user to decipher the phrase
